summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Platinum Air Dry Crème 6 is a time-saving styling crème that dramatically reduces air dry time up to 59% and enhances natural body for effortless looks with a finish that feels product-free.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces drying time up to 59%Ideal for all hair typesTames frizz and resist humidityEnhances natural bodyNatural, product free finish with a light holdItem 2543711How To UseApply to towel-dried hair from scalp to ends. Let hair air dry or layer with any Kenra Platinum styling product for desired end result.Precautions: Flammable. Do not use near open flame or while smoking. Avoid eye contact. For external use only. In the event of adverse reaction, discontinue use and contact a physician immediately. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Hexamethyldisiloxane, Propylene Glycol, Polyimide-1, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone, Ppg-1 Trideceth-6, Sorbic Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Amyl Cinnamal, Linalool.
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried hair from scalp to ends. Let hair air dry or layer with any Kenra Platinum styling product for desired end result.Precautions: Flammable. Do not use near open flame or while smoking. Avoid eye contact. For external use only. In the event of adverse reaction, discontinue use and contact a physician immediately. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Skip this product!
reviews.comments: Kendra Air Dry Crème promises to cut drying time; it does.  The directions fail to mention that this product also makes your hair extremely dry!  This won't ever be my hair care goal.  Save your money.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Live this!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have fine slightly wavy hair. It gets frizzy if I let it air dry. I tried this and love it. The frizz was gone. The first time I used it I used too much (a quarter size) on my very short hair and it was crunchy. The second time I used it I used way less and I had no issues. I feel like it helped with volume as well. The scent is really good. I'm really glad I found this product.

reviews.headline: love this!
reviews.comments: works really well on my curly hair. leaves it feeling soft and fluffy. i like this a lot better then a blowdry and thats saying a lot!

reviews.headline: love this!
reviews.comments: works really well on my curly hair. leaves it feeling soft and fluffy. i like this a lot better then a blowdry and thats saying a lot!

reviews.headline: Air dry magic
reviews.comments: Smells amazing! Not too strong. Doesn't weigh down my fine wavy hair.

reviews.headline: Be careful about how much you use!
reviews.comments: I have shoulder length wavy hair and have been experimenting with this product to have another option when i dont feel like blow drying my hair. its been really difficult to find a sweet spot where the product works as intended snd covers all of my hair and doesn't make my hair feel heavy and a little sticky. The back of the bottle also has large warnings about the product's flammability so i would be careful using heat styling after putting this on the hair.

reviews.headline: do not buy!!
reviews.comments: this made my hair turn yellow!I used this product to get ready for a work event! I got fired because it was a fashion show and my hair ruined the whole event!!

reviews.headline: Air dry AND Blow dry!!
reviews.comments:
I have super thick, coarse, naturally dry and wavy hair. I'm crazy about both Kenra and Color Wow for my hair. I already use a couple of leave ins plus Kenra Blow Dry Spray. So I decided not to change anything from my normal routine, but just ADD this. WOW!!! It's amazing!!! Plus it smells great!!! 
The first 2 times I used this, I blow dried my hair instead of letting it air dry. This is amazing for a blow dry!!! My hair is super soft and silky!!! It stayed soft and held the style day after day after day … EVEN with spraying it w/Bed Head Masterpiece Extra Strong Hold every day!!! I know! It sounds like I am making this up!!! But I am a freak when it comes to my hair! It's so heavy I have to use a strong hold hairspray to keep it lifted all day … and I can't stand it feeling dry, tangley, or like it has product in it. But my hair looked as good - or better - as the day I washed it - every day!!! I curled it again every morning. Each day I thought: I'll need to shampoo tomorrow … on the SIXTH day I FINALLY washed it again!!!
So this time I let it air dry. My hair stays damp underneath or in the middle for several hours … but not w/THIS Crême! It was COMPLETELY dry all the way thru in less than 2 hours. It's super soft snd it smells SO GOOD!!! 
I use a tiny amount for all my hair … between a pea size and a dime size. I flip my head over, work it thru, then today I just scrunched it into place. Super cute! Super soft! Great hold! No sticky, crunchy, or heavy product feel. I honestly cannot feel any thing in my hair. It feels better than w/no product!

reviews.headline: My go to for when I want to leave my hair wavy!
reviews.comments: I can either blow dry my hair and make it nice and smooth, or air dry it to showcase my waves. Whenever I am in the mood to let it go, I always turn to this product. It is the best I have found for accentuating the waves. I just put a quarter size dollop into my long hair, scrunch, paying attention not to disturb the waves and I like to focus on my crown to give my waves some height. Then, I finish off by scrunching with hair spray, and I am done!  With second day hair, I just rinse hair in shower and reapply my steps. Love this! Never really felt like I could embrace my waviness until air dry creme!

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I dislike the smell. Can't use it

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Several times a week I wash my hair and apply this cream and then go to bed with wet hair. I wake up and there are no frizzies. Will continue to use this cream.

reviews.headline: perfect for me
reviews.comments: My hair is permed 2 B-C and this is the best product on the market for my hair. I wish it wasn't because it's kind of pricy and not always in stock where I live but nothing else gives me definition with crunchiness. It doesn't weigh down my hair or loon greasy.

reviews.headline: Magic
reviews.comments: This stuff is magic. Some how makes air dry hair look intentional and full. Idk how. Stsrt with a little and add more. I kinda squeeze it in then scrunch. Twisted a few pieces while it dried for dined curl/wave and bam! Pumped to 86 the hair dryer. Game changer.

reviews.headline: Never want to be without!!!!
reviews.comments: My sister in law introduced me to this product!! Love,love,love this can't say enough.This is all I use in my hair!!!

reviews.headline: Love this air dry cream!
reviews.comments: Unlike most people, I air dry my hair 97% of the time and it's difficult to find a product not made as a heat protectant. Enter Kent's hair dry crème! It's light weight, not a strong oder, and best of all, prevents fizz and flyaways! I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Good for my Hair
reviews.comments: This is a repeat purchase.  I lve the smell, and a small amount refreshes my hair in the morning with a quick blow dry.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.comments: So glad I purchased the Air Dry Cream. A lot less frizz and hair texture is great.

reviews.headline: Good for low-effort days
reviews.comments:
This is good for when you want to look like you naturally woke up with nice hair, but don't feel like doing much with it. Which is great, because that's me most days lol! I have fine, slightly wavy, frizzy hair and an oily scalp. This helps cut down on the frizz, enhances my wave a bit, and reduces drying time by maybe 20 minutes for me. It doesn't feel like anything is in my hair, and doesn't make my hair greasy. It helps give a little volume on the first use, but you really need to use a shampoo with sulfates to prevent build-up. Otherwise the silicone in this product does start to weigh very fine hair down. I prefer sulfate-free shampoo, so the fact that it starts weighing down after one use is an issue for me.

Overall, I like it and will probably buy it again when I run out.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Love Kenra's Perfect Blowout, but on days I can't be bothered, this product is wonderful. Lightweight, non greasy, which is nice for my fine, thin, coarse hair. Defrizzes quite a bit, and it does speed up the dry time. Smells nice, as all the Kenra products do. Love it!

media.headline: Feels Great !
media.caption: The  size will last me a long time.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have used this hair item three times so far. I have been very pleased every time. I do not like to blow dry my hair to often. So I was excited  to try this that claims to help hair style faster.
Well I for sure do like it. I Used about a nickel size amount and put in my towel dried hair. I  combed my hair all the way from root to tip as I normally do.
After my hair was completely dry. I used my hot hair styler. I Will say that I do believe that it helps to style faster and easier. So that I did not have to use the hot tool for very long.
My hair stays soft and no frizzy at all.
faceoff_positive.headline: Feels Great !

faceoff_negative.comments: I always air dry my hair so I was excited to try a product made for air drying. I have fine, thinning hair so my hair dries quickly already so I wasn't sure what to expect when using the Kenra Professional Air Dry Crème 6. I did not notice a difference in drying time. It also says it helps with frizz and body. There might have been a little less frizz but I don't feel like this really did anything for me. On the plus side it also didn't weigh my hair down or make it crunchy. It really is like there in nothing in my hair at all. It is early spring so it isn't humid yet in Ohio, so maybe this would work better as a summer product, but for now I have to say it isn't for me. It might be better for those with thicker hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: didn't work for me, but maybe it will for you
